meanings.sent1: She enjoys aromatizing her home with scented candles.
meanings.sent2: The flowers in the garden are aromatizing the air with their sweet smell.
meanings.sent3: The chef was so good at aromatizing the dishes that even the pickiest eater was impressed.
meanings.sent4: The fresh rain on the earth was aromatizing the soil, awakening the senses.
meanings.sent5: The bakery was aromatizing the whole street with the smell of freshly baked bread.

meanings.definition: To add fragrance or scent to something.
meanings.sent1: She is aromatizing her homemade soap with lavender oil.
meanings.sent2: The perfumer is skilled at aromatizing perfumes with various floral notes.
meanings.sent3: The prankster thought it would be funny to aromatize the room with a stinky spray.
meanings.sent4: The morning dew was aromatizing the grass with a fresh, clean scent.
meanings.sent5: The campfire was aromatizing the night air with the smell of burning wood.
